content: ABU DHABI  Feb 22 The United Arab Emirates (UAE) announced 3.42 billion dirhams  ($931 million) in defence procurement contracts on Wednesday  the fourth day of the biennial International Defence Exhibition (Idex) in Abu Dhabi.
name: IDEX Corporation
title: $931 mln in defence contracts announced on day four of Abu Dhabi expo

content: Abu Dhabi  Feb 21 The United Arab Emirates (UAE) announced 4.07 billion dirhams ($1.11 billion) in defence procurement contracts on Tuesday  the third day of the biennial International Defence Exhibition (Idex) in Abu Dhabi.
name: IDEX Corporation
title: $1.1 bln in defence contracts announced on third day of Abu Dhabi expo

content: ** Premier Farnell up c.8 pct & top Stoxx small market gainer as co announces sale of its industrial products unit to IDEX Corp for $224.2 mln cash
name: IDEX Corporation
title: BUZZ-Premier Farnell: top Stoxx small cos gainer on unit sale

content: Feb 5 Engineering supply group Premier Farnell Plc said it would sell its industrial products unit Akron Brass to U.S.-based IDEX Corp for $224.2 million in cash  sending its shares up as much as 10 percent.
name: IDEX Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Premier Farnell to sell Akron Brass unit to IDEX for $224.2 mln

content: Engineering supply group Premier Farnell Plc  said it would sell its industrial products division Akron Brass to U.S. -based IDEX Corp  for $224.2 million in cash.
name: IDEX Corporation
title: Premier Farnell to sell Akron Brass unit to IDEX for $224.2 million
